name: Acute Psychiatry
dec: We believe psychiatric emergencies are medical emergencies. And the best acute psychiatric and internationally recognized expert care is delivered when patients are treated in a less stressful, less restrictive setting.

name: Addiction Psychiatry
dec: Led by Our Internationally recognized Acute and Psychiatry practice's transformed the standard of care for patients in behavioral health crisis and alleviated care delays and crowding in hospitals.

name: Behavioral Health
dec: Together we are transforming the way healthcare is delivered to create a better world with better access to quality, affordable care for all—where providers feel connected and successful.

name: Inpatient Psychiatry
dec: We consider ourselves one team and our team spans skill sets, passions. Developing a culture of caring is something we take seriously and includes the empathy and care we show our to each other.

name: Consultation-Liaison
dec: We believe healthcare is more than a business. With our collective vast experience spanning nearly 50 years, we’re able to develop and graduate new pathways to better care with the future in mind.

name: Compulsive Disorder
dec: We believe psychiatric emergencies are medical emergencies. And the best acute psychiatric and internationally recognized expert care is delivered when patients are treated in a less stressful, less restrictive setting.
